Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory728.jpg'}
{3: 'Just below the wooden deck along the rock face is a clutter of murky clouds.'}
{3: 'The setting sun dips into the mountain—a mere blink, and it will vanish.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Mi Ku', 3: 'For the one who seeks the mountain, their gaze is filled with nothing but the winding path, the steps adorned with moss, and the unconquered ridge.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Mi Ku', 3: 'You could see Kowloong from here in the past, but the city would disappear from view past this point.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The mechanoids stationed on the deck scatter as the old man finishes his sentence. A path to the edge of the deck is cleared for Hanying and the old man.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Yet we cannot see anything but somber clouds now...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Still deeply troubled by the unbearable "truth," Hanying is not in the mood to appreciate the scenery pointed out by the old man.'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'If all the mechanoids on this mountain are humans, does that mean...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Mi Ku', 3: 'That is not exactly true. These mechanoids are merely reflections in this dream of the "real" mechanoids in the real world.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Mi Ku', 3: 'In this reflection, "The Cradle" inserts the extracted memory and data of the humans into the mechanoids in order to control the mechanoids that are in real life.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "Which means... I've been killing humans... since we entered this mountain...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Mi Ku', 3: 'Do you find that difficult to accept?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "I don't know... I really don't know...", 4: '1'}
{3: "Hanying's voice trembles slightly as her body does."}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "Inside the body of these mechanoids are living human beings... I just don't...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Mi Ku', 3: 'Perhaps all of us are just cold, lifeless machines in human skin that commit human sins...', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hanying', 3: 'No! That is not the same!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Hanying stares at her hands, unable to stop the trembling.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cgqz3003.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory728.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab'}
{1: '1', 3: "No, no, it shouldn't have been like this...", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory234.png'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: '1', 3: 'She only ever wanted to find Yoyo, to find the meaning of the "heart" and the "soul," to fulfill her promise, and nothing more.', 4: '1', 5: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory728.jpg'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Perhaps the self-sacrifice that she so firmly believed in was but an excuse to justify her actions and nothing more than a cover for her selfishness...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'I... What on earth have I done...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Mi Ku', 3: "I guess it's safe to say that anything you encounter here... are not humans that are alive.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Mi Ku', 3: 'Can a human be alive without a physical body, with only his memories and data?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Like a caring parent, the old man gently strokes the metal arm of the Blubber mechanoid sitting beside him.'}
{2: 'Mi Ku', 3: '"The Cradle" duplicated human memories and data to project onto this dream. At that point, "they" had already given up all hope and died.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Mi Ku', 3: 'They chose death willingly. It was not for the sake of others... In fact, "they" were grateful to you.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "Just because all they have are their thoughts and spirits doesn't make them any less human, though!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Their hearts, their memories, their wishes and pain... I heard them all!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'I was there to see them dissipate, like machines falling apart... crumbling into pieces.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'The old man hunches over with difficulty to pick up the rusted and jagged long sword.'}
{3: 'The sword seems too heavy for the old man. He can barely lift it over to give to Hanying.'}
{2: 'Mi Ku', 3: "Didn't you already hear his wish?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Mi Ku', 3: 'Not everyone can bear the weight of life.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Mi Ku', 3: 'Humans have the right to choose to live in the past, just as they have the right to choose to die because of the past.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Mi Ku', 3: 'Instilling them with hope... is even more cruel.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Hanying clenches the sword that has all but fallen apart, trying to feel the warmth left by its owner.'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'If they can live a life full of hope, why would they choose to die?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Mi Ku', 3: 'Because "hope" is a burden too heavy for "them."', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Hanying cannot wrap her head around the idea. It is simply impossible for a mechanoid to understand such logic.'}
{3: 'A mechanoid has no reason to reject an acceptable result produced by an algorithm that works with correct inputs.'}
{3: 'If they can live on with even just a slither of hope, why would they throw their lives away?'}
{2: 'Mi Ku', 3: "Don't blame yourself.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Mi Ku', 3: 'There is so much between life and death that even humans cannot understand.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Mi Ku', 3: "There are things you need to attend to that are more crucial than this, aren't there? You can always come back to thinking about these on a different day.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Mi Ku', 3: 'You and your friend are still looking for someone, right?', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Hanying nods in silence. She needs some time to process the "truth."'}
{2: 'Mi Ku', 3: 'The girl and Kowloong Crew who followed her into the mountain are in the grand hall on the mountaintop, and they are still alive.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'The mountaintop...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Mi Ku', 3: 'You have my best wishes, dear child.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Mi Ku', 3: 'But please put an end to this dream... even if you cannot save her.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'As the old man turns around without another word, he faces away from the bewildering, blood-soaked sea of clouds stained by the sunset.'}
{2: 'Mi Ku', 3: 'If this dream continues, the streets of Kowloong will soon be flooded with mechanoids like these.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Mi Ku', 3: 'These mechanoids with their weapons will know what to do even if "The Cradle" doesn\'t.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Mi Ku', 3: 'And when that happens, the fate that commands life and death... will no longer be in the hands of the people.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Which means I have to kill the mechanoids and the humans... to prevent this calamity from befalling Kowloong?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "Isn't there... another way out? A way to save the souls and data of these Kowloong civilians while thwarting The Cradle's scheme?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Mi Ku', 3: 'What do you think?', 4: '2'}

{3: 'If there were a way to save everyone, then Yoyo could have kept her memories and returned to Kowloong, and Hanying herself would not have died that night after "The Cradle" gained control of her.'}
{3: 'When you cannot have the cake and eat it, you must make your choice.'}
{3: 'For a mechanoid, though, this should be a no-brainer—sacrificing the few in order to save the many is the only correct option.'}
{3: 'She knows that the decision should be an easy one.'}
{3: "But that doesn't make it any less painful."}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "No, there isn't.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Mi Ku', 3: "You see, we may have control over certain things—but there are things where we simply don't have a choice.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Mi Ku', 3: 'It is time to wake up... from this dream.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Mi Ku', 3: 'Before you go, keep in mind that there is a gate between reality and this dream.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Mi Ku', 3: 'The monk you met earlier is the guardian of that gate.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Is he... a human, too?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Mi Ku', 3: 'In a sense... yes, but he was given the duty of guarding the Gate.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Mi Ku', 3: 'You must pass through the Gate to see the reality.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Mi Ku', 3: 'In order... to see Fu Shen.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Dong... dong...'}
{3: 'The bell seems to be ringing right inside her ear, and its sounds are becoming increasingly solemn and distinct.'}
{3: 'The bodies of the mechanoids that have gathered on the deck slowly dissipate and finally disappear altogether.'}
{2: 'Mi Ku', 3: 'Yes. It is a very special mechanoid that has a "heart"—just like you.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Mi Ku', 3: "But unlike you, it believes that it's been living in a dream when it is actually been living in reality all along.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "That's the polar opposite of what people living here think...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Mi Ku', 3: 'It was robbed of the right to dream because mechanoids cannot dream.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "But aren't we in a dream right now?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Mi Ku', 3: "That's why it can only live in reality, even though reality might be a bit too... cruel for it.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Dong... dong... dong...'}
{3: 'Resonating through the mountains, the bell chimes grow louder, almost to the point of ear-shattering.'}
{2: 'Mi Ku', 3: 'Could you promise me one last thing before you go?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Mi Ku', 3: 'Although what I ask of you may be just as cruel...', 4: '2'}
{3: 'The old man pauses for a moment as if to let Hanying prepare herself.'}
{3: "But there's no need for the old man to lay it out for her—because Hanying already knows in her heart what she has to do."}
{3: '"Fu Shen"—\'tis the name of the mechanoid with a "heart" she will likely have to kill.'}
{3: 'Just as she awakened from a dream after having died once, those who are suffering in the cruel reality have the right to be in an ageless sleep inside a dream.'}
{2: 'Mi Ku', 3: 'Your eyes already behold my question.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Mi Ku', 3: 'But do you have the answer in your heart?', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Does she really have the <ANSWER>?'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "No... I don't know.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'I don\'t have power over someone else\'s life and death, because it\'s a decision his own "heart" needs to make.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Mi Ku', 3: 'Well... you already have the answer in your heart, then. All that you are looking for can be found here.', 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryGoldDust.prefab', 3: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryGoldDust.prefab', 4: '2'}
{3: 'The elderly figure slowly fades away and vanishes. The deck is once again empty, save for Hanying and Spooner in the distance...'}
{3: 'Along with the chimes of the bell ringing in their ears.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Spooner', 3: "They're all gone.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'The sinking sun casts its last rays on Hanying. Her shadow stretches across the lonesome deck, silently enduring the somber tolls.'}
{3: 'The rays of dusk stain like the blood, the very crimson liquid that once soaked her hands...'}
{3: 'The vital fluid from "Lady Qu" that dyed her hands maroon many moons ago.'}
{3: 'Befitting the same brilliant color are the laughter, the screams, and the births and deaths that took place that night.'}
{2: 'Spooner', 3: 'It\'s almost impossible to imagine what "The Cradle" has done on this mountain.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Spooner', 3: 'Murdering humans, extracting their memories and data to create digitalized husks, before implanting them into mechanoids... this is a living hell.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Do you consider those humans dead?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Spooner', 3: 'They are dead from a physiological perspective.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'But the mechanoids we met just now—No, I mean the Kowloong civilians. The way they behave and speak, their memories... They clearly are living human beings.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Spooner shakes his head.'}
{2: 'Spooner', 3: "I'm not sure how to word it, but I think the truth is much more complicated than that.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Spooner', 3: 'The truth might be cruel, but... I think we need to accept it to be merciful about it.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Spooner', 3: 'Not every story has a happy ending and we have no choice but to accept that at a time like this.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Spooner', 3: "And that reminds me of Ulysses. God only knows how he's holding up...", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Spooner becomes choked up and leaves the sentence unfinished.'}
{3: 'Hanying, however, knows that the reality is probably far worse than what Spooner might expect...'}
{3: '"All that you came looking for can be found here."'}
{3: 'She is looking for Yoyo and, according to the old man, Yoyo is safe at the peak.'}
{3: 'But they still haven\'t seen this "Ulysses" that Spooner is looking for—and if they are to see Ulysses here, then his fate most likely is already sealed...'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "Spooner, I'm sorry. I... I will never be able to forgive myself.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Spooner', 3: 'Huh? Why do you say that?', 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: '1', 3: '"But what I ask of you may be just as cruel..."', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hanying', 3: "I think I'm just saying it out of... regret? A sense of guilt? Or... it might be because I did something terribly wrong.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Can I really do this?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'I do not want to be in this beautiful yet hollow dream any longer, but I have to face an even more painful truth to leave.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Is all of this... really worth it?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Her fingertips instinctively move toward her neck once again—toward that enduring scar.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory551.jpg'}
{1: '1', 3: 'On that fateful night, she hurt Yoyo. She deceived Yoyo and they turned into enemies.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cgqz3003.jpg'}
{1: '1', 3: 'But on that same night, she chose death in order to protect Yoyo.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory551.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLouDianNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'She was nothing more than an ordinary mechanoid, an ordinary dancer.'}
{3: 'She did not have the power to protect everyone. She could only selfishly keep her "hope" safe in her hands.'}
{3: 'She hoped and prayed that Yoyo could live and that she would one day be able to make "her own" choices.'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLouDianNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{3: 'She died for hope.'}
{3: 'She held tightly onto that hope throughout that beautiful dream.'}
{3: 'That was how she was able to continue "living" in that dream, until the day she awoke.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory728.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hanying', 3: 'I... will never deny the things I have done.', 4: '1'}

{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Perhaps dreams were never as delightful and sweet as they are portrayed in ballads and lullabies. If I have to live with this gruesome reality, then I am prepared to pay an equal price.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Come what may—whether it is a human or a mechanoid, alive or dead, I am ready to face it.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Leaving the last rays of the sun and the sea of clouds behind, Hanying steps onto the final stretch of the narrow, rocky path.'}
